cleaned_text: Ayurveda and COVID-19: Where psychoneuroimmunology and the meaning response meet. Brain Behav Immun ; 87: 8-9, 2020 07. Artículo en Inglés | MEDLINE | ID: covidwho-1719343 ABSTRACTThe COVID-19 pandemic has led to effects of Ayurveda, a traditional system of by the Indian [government]as an "immune booster", are examined from the point of as well as the "meaning response" described by Moerman.
